args: We managed to get all the preparations\nfor the Halloween party taken care of,\nthanks to Edward.
I wonder if he's getting enough rest.\nDirecting all the preparations AND taking\nout fiends has to be exhausting.
Hmm? Oh, there he is now.\n...And is that Althemia with him?
Madam Althemia, how goes progress on\nthe party tricks?
Oh! Umm... Y-you mean like the fog,\nand...um...bats?
Yes, your magical tricks. I trust there is\nno delay in your preparation?
O-of course not! Obviously I'm done!\nYou don't have to remind me.
Splendid. Then I shall call on you again\nlater to confirm things are ready.
Hey there, Edward. You're really burning\nthe midnight oil on the party prep.
It seems to be coming together nicely.\nI know I'm looking forward to it.
I appreciate your kind words, but I merely\ndid what was required of me.
Not at all. It's thanks to all your hard work\nthat we've come this far and done so well.
But you haven't taken a single break,\nhave you? How about you give yourself\ntoday to relax a little?
I must decline, master. I have no need of\nsuch things. Besides, I've quite the full\nschedule ahead of me.
In that case, I'll take on some of it for you.\nWill you take a break then?
I'm really worried about you overworking\nyourself.
You needn't worry. Working in the service\nof one's master brings joy to a butler such\nas myself.
Hmm... Okay then, what if I ORDERED you\nto take a load off?
Does my master mean to say that he\nwould bid me take a break?
If that is what my master wishes, then I,\nas a faithful servant, could not go against\nit, however much I might wish to.
In that case, I order you to relax!
That's quite the undignified command.\nAnd yet... Oh, very well.
I shall take a day of rest for myself.
Just make sure to do lots of relaxing.\nIt's your one day off, after all.
I hope this will lead Edward to let loose\na little bit and enjoy himself.
Let's see... I'm done with the patrol of\nthe castle perimeter, so next I need to...
Whew! Doing his job is making me realize\njust how much work Edward gives himself.
He can do all of this without even batting\nan eye. What a guy.
Master {player_name}, it's time\nfor lunch. Please come to the dining hall.
Okay, will do. Thanks, Edward. I...\nHey, wait a second!
I ordered you to take the day off!
Yes, you gave me a day off from work.\nAs such, I've simply opted to spend my\ntime doing whatsoever I please.
Okay, now you're just searching for a\nloophole...
Oh, dear. We've been standing here\ngabbing away, and now lunch is late.
Please hurry to the dining hall now,\nMaster {player_name}.
Okay, okay! I'm going. But will you please\ntake an actual break? PLEASE?
Let's see, I've brought the fresh-baked\ncookies to the Sweet Retreat, so next\non the docket is...
Um, Edward? What are you doing?
I am practicing my sword swings, master.
But why are you doing it on your DAY OFF?\nYou're supposed to be RELAXING.
What are you talking about? I've plenty\nof time to myself today, yes?
If I don't train now, when will I do so?
Okay, yes, but... Look, this isn't what\nI meant at all!
I had you take the day because I thought\nyou would be worn out and tired.
I know my own body well, and you've\nnothing to be worried about.
I am. And what's more, being idle fills me\nwith unease and ends up rather wearing\nme down.
I am most at ease when I am working\nhard for you, master.
I guess I can't argue with that if it's really\nhow you feel...
I am grateful for your considerationand\nfor your allowing me a day of rest, master.
That is precisely why I wish to devote this\nprecious time to the things I want to do.
Well, if you're fine with things...
Thank you for your understanding.\n...Great heavens, look at the time!
I must return to the castle and begin\ndinner. By your leave, master?
I get that he's a hardworking guy,\nbut is he really going to be all right?
